frontmatter.title: Presenter
frontmatter.company: 情報処理学会第86回全国大会

node.html:
• Presented my research at IPSJ conference.
  • Won the Student Encouragement Award.

• Elected as Student Alumni President 2021.
  • Contributed extensively to manage and organizing inner university programmes.

• Special Prize winner at C Programming contest organized by DITU at 2020.
  • Wrote algorithm in C for simulation of Rubic's Cube
• Become second at Japanese Language Speech contest organized by DITU.
• Participated in "AIで車を走らせよ" a AI powered robotic car race contest held at TOKYO. 2019
• Become winner at Japanese Language Contest organized by Only One Japanese Language School.
